document.heading: Foster Care Goals Act of 1983 Amendment Act of 1992

history.narrative: Law 9-166, the “Foster Care Goals Act of 1983 Amendment Act of 1992,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-373, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 2, 1992, and July 7, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 23, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-264 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-166 became effective on October 1, 1992.
